quest_desc.qdesc: 아르젠타 시작. 데커드-> 베일리-> 루퍼트-> 메이-> 티아나-> 케빈 기도하는 자의 안식처 보스전 클리어-> 데이비드 구출 데이비드와 대화 잿빛 폐허의 아르젠타와 대화 요리를 구해온다(향긋한 와인맛 우유) 아르젠타는 노예의 증거를 가져가고 데이비드를 치료한 후, 새 노예로 임명한다. 아르젠타의 진정한 노예 타이틀 획득. 끝.

qnpc.npckname: 아르젠타의 두번째 노예 데이비드(기도하는 자의 안식처)

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Adventurer David$
What, what are you looking at?! I... I'm just saving up my powers!
(You can obtain the quest from Argenta in Ash Ruins.)

$Adventurer David$
What, what are you looking at?! I... I'm just saving up my powers!
(You can obtain the quest from Argenta in Ash Ruins.)

$Merchant May$
Hmm... I think I actually had something to say to you...
(You can obtain the quest from Argenta in Ash Ruins.)

$Kevin$
Even if you want to get on the airship, you can't now!
(You can obtain the quest from Argenta in Ash Ruins.)

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Hmm... Shouldn't you be busy with something else right now?
(You can obtain the quest from Argenta in Ash Ruins.)

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
Get out of my face if you don't have any business
(Quest from Argenta in Ash Ruins needed to proceed)

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
Don't you have anything to store or retrieve? Then come back when you have item to store.
(You can obtain the quest from Argenta in Ash Ruins.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you have something to say to me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
... Fool.
(Argenta is thinking about something, seems like she has something to say.)

$Argenta$
Hmph. I have nothing to say to you right now, alright? Go and finish your business first.
(This quest is only available after you have completed the main scenario for Calderock Village and Argenta's Side Quest.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>They were talking about me? What were they talking about?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I've been hearing people in town talking about you. Were you aware of this?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A person who is well-informed about surrounding..?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
An rumor is circulating, and I can't believe you are so peacefully hanging around like this... This is so pathetic. Such a fool. If you're curious, then go ask the person who is well-informed about surrounding...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>Accept quest.</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Argenta's Slave$</html>

$Argenta$
Yes. I'm talking about that Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard or whatever, who has the loud voice. I'm hungry now and all of this is getting annoying, so don't talk to me. I have generously given you enough information, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Where is it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Oh... Thank you for coming like this. I had something to tell you. I'm really thankful that you worked night and day for Calderock Village. But there's something that... Cough. Ummph.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What? Secret communicating? With who? Where? Why?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
This is not easy for me to say to you but... There's been a pretty bad rumor about you circulating lately. Does this ring a bell? According to the rumor, you are... Umm... They say you are secretly communicating with someone, can you believe it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I have nothing to do with the Dark Elf.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
According... According to the rumor, you are secretly communicating with the monster dressed in red clothes. Didn't you say the other time that the red Dark Elf was spreading the poison around?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What? Sanctuary Flower Bouquet? (That sounds familiar...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
I want to trust you, but the rumors are quite detailed. Somebody claims to have seen you putting together a Sanctuary Flower Bouquet from the Forest Sanctuary, and then giving it to the red monster.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Oh, I heard that somebody has left the Sanctuary Flower Bouquet with Warehouse Rupert. You should go and ask about it. I think it would be best for you to investigate the matter more deeply, for your own honor. I'll also ask around.

$ Adventurer David$
What, what are you looking at?! I'm just... saving my strength for now! I'm... I'm not scared at all!

$Adventurer David$
What, what are you looking at?! I'm just... saving my strength for now! I'm... I'm not scared at all!

$Merchant May$
Hmm... I think I actually had something to say to you... I could almost remember it... Or not...
(You must go to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard.)

$Kevin$
Even if you want to get on the airship, you can't now!
(You must go to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard.)

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
You seem to have some free time today. An adventurer with free time does not have anything to store here.
(You must go to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard.)

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
Get out of my face, if you don't have anything to talk.
(You must go to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard.)

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Go and ask Warehouse Keeper Rupert some questions. I feel sorry and ashamed for you that such a weird rumor has been circulating. Oh how could this happen...

$Merchant May$
I'm sorry, but they say that where there's smoke, there's fire, right? Hmm... I didn't think you were such a person, but I guess there will always be some bad people.
I mean, it's not that I really believe in the rumor. Hehehe.

$Kevin$
Hmm... I thought you were a good person. Why would such a rumor start? Don't you think that someone jealous might have framed you? Well, it's only my imagination.

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
What's going on? Don't just mumble, speak up.
See, that's why such weird rumors are circulating about you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
Wow! It's {user_nick}! The one mentioned in all the rumors! You must be quite worried about the abrupt rumors. I don't believe in such rumors, so don't worry.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What was this person like?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
Oh! So you've come by word from Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard. Well, it's just like how you may have heard. I am temporarily holding the Sanctuary Flower Bouquet. The person who brought this to me told me the rumor about you.

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
Well I could easily find that out by going through the documents, but I cannot just leak the list of my customers. How about asking the ladies in town? Merchant May seems to know much about the news around here, so she might know.

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
But don't blame me. Do you think I wouldn't want to tell you the information? It's just that I would not have the rights to do my business if I did that. Go and ask Merchant May about it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You directly asked Merchant May about it.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May${action:talk}
Huh! Rumors say that you have joined hands with the red monster, is that true?
It's a lie, isn't it?! Isn't it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Huh? Ancient Book? I've never heard about that before...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
The rumor about the Sanctuary Flower Bouquet, and the reports about you stealing the Ancient Book from the Silent Monastery Main Hall... All of this really makes you seem really suspicious! It really does, {user_nick}!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>An old novel? An Ancient Book? That does sound a little familiar...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
Oh come on! Someone claimed to have stopped you from stealing the book, and then brought the Ancient Book here to me. The person then offered to sell it to me at a cheap price. I'm telling you, somebody brought it to me like that! Well, I was a little disappointed when I found out that it was just a petty old novel...

$Merchant May$
Master Sorceress Tiana said she also heard about something else... Hmm... I don't remember though. Why don't you go and ask for yourself? But Tiana is scary, so she might hit you of course.

$Merchant May$
Did you talk to Master Sorceress Tiana? Hehe. Are you scared that you might get hit? The whole weird rumor thing is driving me crazy! I can't seem to focus on my work. Hmm...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Sorceress Tiana gave a suspicious look.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tiana$
Oh, the rumor! What really happened?
That's funny.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But there was nothing we can do about the poison...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tiana$
Although you have given some great effort at the Road of No Return, the poison was not fully spread, right? The monsters still appears, as if you're secretly communicating with the enemy.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm telling you.. That, it's not a monster...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tiana$
There is also something about stopping the Red Dark Elf about the rumor giving the Dark Elf's necklace to the monster wearing red clothes outside of town.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Huh? The Dark Elf's Necklace?! </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tiana$
There are all kinds of story on why you would go through all the trouble to go back to the Road of No Return, which is now in ruins, just to get the Dark Elf's Necklace. Doesn't common sense tell you that something is suspicious about that?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Adventurer David?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Tiana$
That reminds me. The one talking about the Dark Elf's Necklace... You know that person, don't you? That person... Who was it...?

$Master Sorceress Tiana${action:talk}
Well, yes. It was some kind of a silly name and look silly too. He said that he would go and visit that self-styled Kevin. He might still be there, so go and check.

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
What? What is it? Didn't you go to Kevin yet?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm not a traitor!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
Huh! It's the traitor who communications with the monster in red clothes!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, yes. I am not a spy nor a traitor.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
I don't believe in such weird rumors. According to Airship Engineer Hubert, you helped him restore the airship so that it could fly again, is that right? Such an adventurer like that would never become a traitor, right? Am I right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>An Adventurer...? Was the name...?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
Some Adventurer fellow came by and sold some Poison Sac, and said bad things. I think that fellow was pretty suspicious.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... I knew it. (You wait and see, Adventurer David!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
Yes! It was Adventurer David!
You two know each other?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I'm Argenta's slave, but not a betrayer!... This makes me sad.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
I'm not sure, but it seems like you two hold a grudge against each other, right? He said that you're he red clothes monster's slave, not its colleague or secret communicator.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes... Alright... (It still bothers me!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
They say that Calderock cannot be completely purified because of that monster in red clothes. Hehe. I don't believe such things! So, {user_nick}, don't worry too much about that rumor.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don't know where he is.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
Well, I guess you still have to take your revenge against your grudge.
is this right? Well.. give him a good punch, or get on your knees and say you're sorry. Do whatever it takes to solve the problem.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What's the request?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
I know where he is! .
I've just heard this a moment ago, but that Adventurer David fellow has received a big request.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Uh... Hmm... It would be a relief if he didn't run away...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
Show the monsters a lesson at the Prayer's Resting Place! He was so arrogant, but hasn't returned yet. Maybe.. he just ran away?

$Kevin$
Oh come on! He's stupid to visit the Prayer's Resting Place all by himself. Why don't you just go and see for yourself.

$Kevin$
That Adventurer David. He's actually a coward, right? I bet he ran away to the Prayer's Resting Place. Hehehe. I'm pretty sure.

$Adventurer David$
(Shivers)... I, I'm not shivering because I'm scared! (Shivers)...
*Sniff sniff*. Mommy... I'm scared! *Sniff sniff*.
(It seems like Adventurer David misses his mother)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you okay?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
I.. I'm not shivering because I'm scared! (Shivers)... Its.. it's just that I've been suddenly ambushed! (Shivers)...
The power over here was different.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>seems like you're hurt.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
(Shivers)... Don't, don't try to be so arrogant just because you have saved me once! (Shivers)... *Sniff sniff*. I miss my mom. *Sniff*. (Adventurer David looks pale from fear. He looks hurt.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I can't believe he still speak nonsense in this situation.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
These wounds are... Nothing! (Shivers)...
Is this how the Great Adventurer Adventurer David will pass away? *Sniff sniff*.

$Adventurer David$
When I pass away, bury me at a sunny place, and pass this down to the generations to come! ...
(You should return to Gray Ruins and talk to Argenta.)

$Master Sorceress Tiana$
Didn't you already go to the Prayer's Resting Place? I was surprised to hear that you went there again! {user_nick}. Hehe. Since you're so brave, you can ignore a few petty rumors.

$Kevin$
Wow! That stupid fellow went there?! He is indeed stupid, right?
You can't beat a fool, don't you think? It's fortunate that he didn't die.

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
What? A rumor about an adventurer? What is that about?
I've already forgotten everything about it. Hahaha.

$Merchant May$
Anyway, was that Adventurer David greatly injured? Poor guy.
I don't know why he would spread such rumors.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
I've heard the rumors. That adventurer named Adventurer David or whatever almost died, didn't he? This happened because he acted on his own without reporting to me.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Don't worry about the rumor. I'll explain everything clearly. It's ridiculous for such a great person like you to be a traitor or the slave of a monster... Not it doesn't make sense at all. Hahaha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You can't really die with the amount of wounds.. you have.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
When I pass away, bury me at a sunny place, and pass this down to the next generation.
That Adventurer David was a brave man...

$Adventurer David$
The sky... The sky is so beautiful. Ha. I'm such a lucky person, to be able to rest beside Argenta. Ha.
(Adventurer David seems to have lost his mind.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He's hurt, i thought that you might be able to heal him...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Hmm? What is this
Isn't this the fool that was wandering around me last time?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Please, just take it as saving one's life, will you?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Heal?... Well, I guess so.
But why should I? This is annoying.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But still.. no matter how pathetic he is.. you can't let him die.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
He should be able to get better on his own.
Oh... so annoying. He is too pathetic.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then I'll bring you something to eat.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I'm hungry. I don't even feel like moving a finger right now, and you want me to heal that fool?
No.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm angry, but he should stay alive.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
What? You will do that? ...Hmm. I'll think about it. But, wait. Are you stupid? That's the fool who went around spreading rumors about you. I thought you were mad at him.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well.. anyway, I'll get you something to eat..</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
... What a weird person..

$Argenta$
Bring me that Fragrant Wine-Flavored Priestess of Darkness Miok from last time. You could get it from the Supplies Merchant or whatever, right?
(Please go to Merchant May.)

$Argenta$
Do you enjoy going through all this troubles.. trying to save someome that you don't even know that well?
(Please go to Merchant May.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(May frowned.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May${action:talk}
Hmm... I've heard that the Adventurer David was really hurt, or was he? I don't know why they show off so much. Don't you think so?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He should be fine after healing.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
I can't believe he recklessly went to the Prayer's Resting Place on his own.
Was he severely injured?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The drink that I bought last time.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
Is that so? I'm very surprised to hear the news.
Oh, what did you want to buy from me again?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Thank you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
Oh... You're talking about the Fragrant Wine-Flavored Priestess of Darkness Miok, right? I'll let you have this one for free. I'm sorry for making such a fuss out of the weird rumor the other time.

$Merchant May$
Frankly, I was thinking of selling it at a discounted price, since I've some left overs. {user_nick}, must be having a hard time, dealing with all the weird rumors going around.
Well, I'll see you again next time!

$Merchant May$
Oh... I really don't understand why the person spread such a rumour.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... What do you mean that you needed one? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
You really got it?
Well, good. I need one anyway.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Argenta took the Proof of Slave without the permission.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
What's what? The new slave is what I'm talking about. You're annoying and high-maintenance. I know you are going to just wander around Saint Haven on your own when you get there. I'll just going to hire an obedient fool as the new slave.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. (I am freed!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
You are fired as of today. I am not going to take you back even if you plead. Got it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You feel bad for Adventurer David...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
And this over here is my new slave. I will make good use of you, weakling!
(Argenta puts the proof of slave on Adventurer David.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#086171>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Argenta$
Okay.. Now i will treat this fool and make him my slave. Get ready to leave to Saint Haven. I am going to take this one with me too.

journal.title: Strange Rumor
journal.contents:
You heard that there's strange rumor spreading in Calderock Village. Go to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard and find out about this rumor.

Calderock Village → Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard at Calderock Village

journal.title: Tracing Strange Rumor I
journal.contents:
Seems like it's true about the strange rumor spreading. Go to Warehouse Keeper Rupert and find out more about the rumor.

Calderock Village → Warehouse Keeper Rupert
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Warehouse Keeper Rupert

journal.title: Tracing Strange Rumor II
journal.contents:
Since Merchant May knows everything about the town, you can find out more about the rumor.

Calderock Village → Merchant May
journal.todo_msg: Please go talk to Merchant May

journal.title: Tracing Strange Rumor III
journal.contents:
Go ask Master Sorceress Tiana about the rumor. Someone you know might have spread the rumor as time passes.

Calderock Village → Training Sorceress Tiana
journal.todo_msg: Please go talk to Master Sorceress Tiana.

journal.title: Tracing Strange Rumor IV
journal.contents:
Guess who started the rumor, but some things are not clear..Visit Kevin.

Calderock Village → Kevin

journal.title: Look for Adventurer David
journal.contents:
As you expected, Adventurer David started all this. But it seems like Adventurer David went to the Prayer's Resting Place alone. Go there and find Adventurer David.

Gray Ruins → Lower Ridge(Forgotten Temple Entrance) → Prayer's Resting Place
journal.todo_msg: Please look for Adventurer David from the Prayer's Resting Place.

journal.title: Rescue Adventurer David
journal.contents:
You saved Adventurer David from deadly situation. Talk to wounded Adventurer David.

Prayer's Resting Place→ Adventurer David
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to trembled Adventurer David.

journal.title: Adventurer David's rescue
journal.contents:
Looks like you need to treat Adventurer David's wounds. Return to Argenta in Gray Ruins and ask her for a help.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Gray Ruins
journal.todo_msg: Please report to Argenta in Gray Ruins.

journal.title: Fragrant Wine-Flavor Priestess of Darkness Miok
journal.contents:
Go get some Fragrant Wine-Flavor Priestess of Darkness Miok from Merchant May.

Calderock Village → Merchant May
journal.destination: Talk to Merchant May in Calderock Village
journal.todo_msg: Please go talk to Merchant May

journal.title: The Emancipation of Slaves
journal.contents:
Return to Argenta in Gray Ruins.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Gray Ruins
journal.todo_msg: Please report to Argenta in Gray Ruins.
